00025 require_once '../sysconfig.inc.php';
00026 // session checking
00027 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00029 
00030 $table_name = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_POST['tableName']));
00031 $table_fields = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_POST['tableFields']));
00032 if (isset($_POST['id']) AND !empty($_POST['id'])) {
00033     $id = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_POST['id']));
00034 } else {
00035     die('<strong style="color: #FF0000;">No ID Supplied!</strong>');
00036 }
00037 
00038 // sql string
00039 $sql_string = "SELECT $table_fields FROM $table_name WHERE $table_fields='$id' LIMIT 1";
00040 
00041 // send query to database
00042 $query = $dbs->query($sql_string);
00043 $error = $dbs->error;
00044 if ($error) {
00045     die('SQL ERROR : '.$error);
00046 }
00047 
00048 if ($query->num_rows > 0) {
00049     echo '<strong style="color: #FF0000;">ID Already exists! Please use another ID</strong>';
00050 } else {
00051     // output the SQL string
00052     echo '<strong>ID Available</strong>';
00053 }
00054 ?>
